features: 【Stylish Ruffled Comforter】Andency ruffled comforter set brings a graceful comfort to your bedding. Compared with other normal comforters, our white ruffle comforter not only makes the whole bedding look more tasteful and stylish, and also can enhance the sense of your entire room. Taking our white ruffle comforter home will add style and comfort to your bedroom.

【3 Pieces White Comforter Set】Available in ruffle comforter full: 1 ruffled comforter (79x90Inch), 2 pillowcases (20×26Inch); ruffle comforter queen: 1 ruffled comforter (90x90Inch), 2 pillowcases (20×26Inch); ruffle comforter king: 1 ruffled comforter (104x90Inch), 2 pillowcases (20×36Inch). Great gift idea for all your loved ones on special occasions; surprise your friends and family members with this ruffle comforter sets.

【Cozy Premium Microfiber】Andency full size comforter set offers exceptional softness and comfort with premium 100% microfiber fabric. The white full comforter with pillow shams is incredibly soft and comfortable, which provides amazing softness warm, and smooth touch feeling. Our soft microfiber ruffle comforter also lightweight, breathable, and suitable for all-year-round use. Laying in this cozy comforter, you can enjoy a night of sound sleep.

【Simple and Versatile】Andency ruffle comforter is solid colors and ruffles stitched, add a hint of elegance to any color scheme or aesthetic. Choosing our ruffle comforter to decorate your room brings you a distinctive feeling of elegance. This shabby chic comforter can easily match all your room style, bedroom, kids' room, or guest room. It also will add an extra layer of warmth while watching TV, reading, relaxing, or sleeping.

【Warm Tips】Our bedding comforter set is packed in a vacuum bag. Maybe some creases will be found when opened the package. There is no need to worry about it, just shake and pat it gently until it becomes fluffy. It is machine washable in cold water on a gentle cycle, and simply sun-dry or tumble dry on a low heat setting. Do not bleach. Do not iron. Do not dry clean.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Andency Ruffle Comforter Set Vintage Ruffle Fringe Comforter-White ruffles on the fringe provide a touch of casual elegance to the bedding set, which enhances the charming appeal of this comforter.
This shabby chic comforter can easily match all your room styles, bedrooms, kids' rooms, or guest rooms. It also will add an extra layer of warmth while watching TV, reading, relaxing, or sleeping.

White Ruffled Comforter Set Why choose Andency farmhouse rustic comforter ? Ruffle Design: A solid white comforter creates a clean look, and the ruffle comforter adopts a retro hem decorative pattern to show an elegant appearance and atmosphere. Soft Microfiber: Our stylish ruffled comforter is made of 100% premium quality microfiber, smooth and gentle to the touch. It will bring you a more breathable and lightweight feeling than a regular comforter. Exquisite Workmanship: Excellent stitching technology makes this shabby chic comforter durable, and also a nice farmhouse room decor. Important is, that the whole-piece polyfill prevents the filling from shifting, or clumping. There is no concern about leakage or ripping. Great Gift: Andency white chic ruffle comforter set will help you build an elegant house that is full of vintage farmhouse looks, the full ruffle comforter sets are a good choice as a birthday gift or special holiday gift to your friends and family. Easy Care: Machine washable in the gentle cycle with cold water separately. Air dry or tumble dry on low heat. Please do not bleach. Since the comforter is vacuum packaged, to completely fluff up this comforter, we suggest you expose it to the sunlight for a few hours and tap it for fluffy.

Full Ruffle Comforter Details Ruffle Design Simple and elegant solid color style， matching the ruffle. It can provide your bedroom with a shabby chic atmosphere. Soft Microfiber White comforter is made from high-quality microfiber, which can provide a soft and breathable feeling, like sleeping under a cloud. Corner Loops Four sewn corner loops to secure the comforter in place. Durable hems ensure excellent longevity and are elegant enough to fit all decorations.

Various Sizes for Your Choice Ruffled twin size comforter set: 1 twin ruffled comforter 66"x 90" and 1 Pillowcase 20"x 26" ; Ruffled full size comforter set: 1 full ruffle comforter 79"x 90" and 2 Pillowcases 20"x 26" ; Ruffled queen size comforter set: 1 queen ruffle comforter 90"x 90" and 2 Pillowcases 20"x 26" ; Ruffled king size comforter set: 1 king ruffle comforter 104"x 90" and 2 Pillowcases 20"x 36" ; Ruffled Cal king size comforter set: 1 Cal king ruffle comforter 104"x96" and 2 Pillowcases 20"x 36" ;

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good value and comfort
reviews.reviewText: This is my second purchase for these comforter sets. I have the dark green and now the dusty blue and i love them both! They are so comfortable and beautiful! With both i immediately washed and dried them then put them on the bed. They were perfectly fluffy and not flat and not too wrinkly! These are light weight but not too thin! Love them. I will buy more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and Good Quality
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to replace a quilt, so didn’t want something heavy. It’s thinner and lighter than a typical comforter, but very warm. I followed recommendations in reviews to size up so it would fall longer. My bed is a full, and I bought the queen size. It is wrinkled from packaging, but a quick steam with the iron smoothed them right out. Khaki color is a bit darker than looks in picture, but very pretty- almost mocha.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The color is perfect
reviews.reviewText: I love this comforter. It fits very good on the bed and the color is exactly as described. It is a thinner comforter which I like. I also use it as a blanket on cold nights and it does not feel heavy on my body. I would like one in another color

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars soft but not thick enough
reviews.reviewText: got this comforter yesterday and it so cute and I like the ruffles at the end, it's light weight and cozy. I was really worry that it'll fall apart when I wash it from some of the reviews I read but it came out in one piece. my only complaints would be that I wish it was bit more thicker and more fluffier but it's still good a blanket so 4 stars, I will pay more down the line.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s a beautiful piece. It makes my room look clean, warm, bright, and cozy. It’s great for weather such as Florida.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this comforter. The color, fit, and weight are perfect. The price is unbeatable! I’m considering purchasing another one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loves this comforter! She said it’s so comfortable and keeps her warm and I washed it and it still looks good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Soft, Lightweight Comforter
reviews.reviewText: It's ok. This is a LIGHTWEIGHT comforter & the pamphlet you get with it says it's lightweight. There are multiple reviews on there that says it's a heavy comforter & that is absolutely not true. I took their word for it & was sorely disappointed. Luckily, I have a coverlet that I can use underneath it for additional warmth in the winter, otherwise I would be freezing. I like that it's buttery soft, comes with 2 pillow cases and the price couldn't be beat! Mine came compressed, did not have a weird smell & fluffed out within a few hours. I recommend running the steamer over it to get the wrinkles out. I bought a King for my Queen sized bed & it fits perfectly! The pillow cases on the King are for King sized pillows, so keep that in mind when ordering. Overall, it's a great set at a low price if you are in the market for a lightweight comforter. Would skip if you need a heavy comforter & live in a colder climate as this is not it.
The crispy white made this a eye catching bed spread. Great for my cottage rental. Looking for plain with a little pretty. Just what I had in mind
Extremely wrinkly, very thin, very cheap looking, was so disappointed
